query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS hormone_dysfunction_profiles (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  profile_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  condition_category VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  primary_condition VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  typical_age_range VARCHAR(50),
  gender_prevalence ENUM('female_predominant', 'male_predominant', 'equal', 'female_only', 'male_only') NOT NULL,
  cardinal_symptoms JSON NOT NULL,
  common_symptoms JSON NOT NULL,
  occasional_symptoms JSON,
  typical_lab_findings JSON NOT NULL,
  lab_severity_markers JSON,
  primary_hormone_system VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  secondary_hormone_systems JSON,
  associated_edc_exposures JSON,
  edc_mechanism TEXT,
  diagnostic_criteria TEXT NOT NULL,
  differential_diagnosis JSON,
  red_flags TEXT,
  first_line_treatment TEXT NOT NULL,
  recommended_protocol_ids JSON,
  expected_response_timeline VARCHAR(100),
  natural_history TEXT,
  treatment_success_rate VARCHAR(50),
  reversibility ENUM('fully_reversible', 'partially_reversible', 'progressive', 'variable') NOT NULL,
  prevalence_data VARCHAR(255),
  evidence_quality ENUM('high', 'moderate', 'low') NOT NULL,
  key_references JSON,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  clinical_notes TEXT,
  INDEX idx_condition_category (condition_category),
  INDEX idx_primary_condition (primary_condition)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bdzn41uM6mMWcv.97707ddd6929 --database 3gcYftfyZmb2335Uoynmho --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS hormone_dysfunction_profiles (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  profile_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,

  gender_prevalence ENUM('female_predominant', 'male_predominant', 'equal', 'female_only', 'male_only') NOT NULL,
  cardinal_symptoms JSON NOT NULL,
  common_symptoms JSON NOT NULL,
  occasional_symptoms JSON,
  typical_lab_findings JSON NOT NULL,
  lab_severity_markers JSON,
  primary_hormone_system VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  secondary_hormone_systems JSON,
  associated_edc_exposures JSON,
  edc_mechanism TEXT,
  diagnostic_criteria TEXT NOT NULL,
  differential_diagnosis JSON,
  red_flags TEXT,
  first_line_treatment TEXT NOT NULL,
  recommended_protocol_ids JSON,
  expected_response_timeline VARCHAR(100),
  natural_history TEXT,
  treatment_success_rate VARCHAR(50),
  reversibility ENUM('fully_reversible', 'partially_reversible', 'progressive', 'variable') NOT NULL,
  prevalence_data VARCHAR(255),
  evidence_quality ENUM('high', 'moderate', 'low') NOT NULL,
  key_references JSON,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  clinical_notes TEXT,
  INDEX idx_condition_category (condition_category),
  INDEX idx_primary_condition (primary_condition)
)
